subtitle: being placed into the situation in one
of the psychiatric hospitals that I was
placed in it was the very first day we
walked in there were a group of eight
nurses with a teacher and the teacher
had left all of his student nurses
standing there while she went in to get
our assignments and there was a young
woman that was there looked to be in her
early 20s she walked over to the group
and she pointed at me and she said you
can help me I know you can and if she
was sitting she sat down with us she's
covered in these marks she's got claw
marks all over her she
um started hearing 25 different voices
he made mention that one of them had a
very long fingernail and was scratching
her and that the facility was saying
that they were self-inflicted she got up
and she started to walk away and as she
got 15 or 20 ft away I'm noticing that
she has these clustered grap looking
type things over each shoulder they were
all kind of clustered together like that
like Santa Claus bags almost and I'm
like oh my God she really is hearing 25
voices she's got aack
